Explosive Outburst.name: Explosive Outburst
Explosive Outburst.flavor: Your wrath reaches a boil and you explode with violence, ripping your weapon through your foes in one savage sweep.
Explosive Outburst.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Explosive Outburst.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and if the target is marked by you, it falls prone.

Unequaled Might.name: Unequaled Might
Unequaled Might.flavor: Your attack hits your enemies hard and they cannot find the strength to stand.
Unequaled Might.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Unequaled Might.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target falls prone. Until the end of the encounter, when the target stands up while adjacent to you, you can make a melee basic attack against the target as an opportunity action.
Unequaled Might.onMiss: Half damage, and the target falls prone.

Mocking Target.name: Mocking Target
Mocking Target.flavor: No attack against you is good enough to escape your scathing, infuriating tongue.
Mocking Target.effect: Until the stance ends, when an enemy attacks you, it is marked until the end of your next turn, unless the attack reduces you to 0 hit points or fewer.
